txt.en: Eluna will travel to a small area east of the Warg camp known as Bloodhollow.\n\nMeet Eluna east of Bloodhollow.
Talk to Eluna at Bloodhollow to the east
'Nice of you to finally arrive! What took you so long?'
Eluna is looking forward to your help with her many tasks.

'You seem to be a person of great ability.'

She pauses a moment.

'You seem to be a person of good ability. If you're inclined to trapes around the wilderness and fight things, I could use your help. Like Talfryn said, I lead a few trainee scouts. I could use an adventurer like yourself to help instruct them. My students and I established a camp to the east. Meet us there. I'll be going back there myself, soon. I don't like to leave them alone for too long. Who knows what trouble they'll make for themselves?'
